Title: Provides for paid family leave and bereavement benefits for miscarriage, fetal death, still birth, and an infant being medically not viable to survive
Summary: Provides for paid family leave and bereavement benefits for miscarriage, fetal death, still birth, and an infant being medically not viable to survive born to an employee or an employee's spouse, domestic partner or person acting as a surrogate for the employee.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to paid family leave and bereavement for miscarriage, fetal death, still birth, and an infant being medically not viable to survive
